alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 4:10AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will some produce blowing and drifting snow in open areas. * WHERE...Northern Cayuga and Oswego counties. Greatest accumulations inland from Lake Ontario. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Wednesday. Heaviest snow will be this morning through mid afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult with snow cover on roads and poor visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commute today.
info.instruction: Widespread accumulating snow will create dangerous travel conditions. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
